pagetitle: Amphipods and isopods
---

- [info_link](https://olympiccoast.noaa.gov/living/marinelife/inverts/inverts.html)
- [info_tagline](Amphipods and isopods are two a large groups of crustaceans that are commonly seen on beaches in Olympic Coast. These beach hoppers help to clean up beaches by eating wrack and carcasses while they are also food for shorebirds and surfzone fishes.)
